entity.name: Boolean_expression
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF (Simple_boolean_expression, Unary_boolean_expression, Binary_boolean_expression, Multiple_arity_boolean_expression, Comparison_expression, Interval_expression, Boolean_defined_function))

entity.name: Comparison_expression
entity.super.expression: (ONEOF (Comparison_equal, Comparison_greater, Comparison_greater_equal, Comparison_less, Comparison_less_equal, Comparison_not_equal, Like_expression))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR(('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR(('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\Binary_generic_expression.operands[2])))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_low)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_item)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_high))

where.label: WR2
where.expression: (('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (SELF.Interval_low)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (SELF.Interval_high)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (SELF.Interval_item))) OR(('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.Interval_low)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.Interval_item)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.Interval_high)))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(operand)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(index1)) AND ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(index2))

function.name: Is_sql_mappable
function.algorithm: LOCAL i: INTEGER; END_LOCAL; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SIMPLE_NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SQL_MAPPABLE_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MINUS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg) THEN RETURN (Is_sql_mappable(arg\Unary_numeric_expression.operand)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.ABS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SIN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.TAN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.ASIN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.ACOS_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.ATAN_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.EXP_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.LOG_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.LOG2_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.LOG10_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SQUARE_ROOT_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.VALUE_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.LENGTH_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.PLUS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MULT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MAXIMUM_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MAXIMUM_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN REPEAT i :=1 TO SIZEOF ( arg\Multiple_arity_numeric_expression.operands); IF NOT Is_sql_mappable( arg\Multiple_arity_numeric_expression.operands[i]) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; END_REPEAT; RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MINUS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SLASH_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (Is_sql_mappable( arg\Binary_numeric_expression.operands[1]) AND Is_sql_mappable(arg\Binary_numeric_expression.operands[2])); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.DIV_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.MOD_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.POWER_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SIMPLE_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NOT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN (Is_sql_mappable (arg\UNARY_GENERIC_EXPRESSION.OPERAND)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.ODD_FUNCTION'IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.XOR_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.AND_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.OR_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN REPEAT i:=1 TO SIZEOF ( arg\MULTIPLE_ARITY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS); IF NOT Is_sql_mappable ( arg\MULTIPLE_ARITY_BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[i]) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; END_REPEAT; RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.EQUALS_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg) THEN RETURN(Is_sql_mappable ( arg\Binary_generic_expression.OPERANDS [1]) AND Is_sql_mappable( arg\Binary_generic_expression.OPERANDS [2])); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_GREATER' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_GREATER_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_LESS' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_LESS_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.COMPARISON_NOT_EQUAL' IN TYPEOF (arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.LIKE_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF (arg)) THEN RETURN (Is_sql_mappable (arg\COMPARISON_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[1]) AND Is_sql_mappable (arg\COMPARISON_EXPRESSION.OPERANDS[2])); END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.INTERVAL_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg) THEN RETURN (Is_sql_mappable(arg\Interval_expression.interval_low) AND Is_sql_mappable(arg\Interval_expression.interval_high) AND Is_sql_mappable(arg\Interval_expression.interval_item)); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.NUMERIC_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.BOOLEAN_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.STRING_DEFINED_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE) ; END_IF; IF 'PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SIMPLE_STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(ARG) THEN RETURN (TRUE); END_IF; IF ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.INDEX_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.SUBSTRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.CONCAT_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) OR ('PARAMETERIZED_CATALOG_DATA_INFORMATION_ARM_LF.FORMAT_FUNCTION' IN TYPEOF(arg)) THEN RETURN (FALSE); END_IF; RETURN (FALSE);
